英文公告.附加說明: (i)Reviewing the provisional tax computation and deferred tax computation prepared by the Singapore Branch for audit purposes;(ii)Ascertaining the Singapore Branch's estimated chargeable income (ECI) and filing the ECI with the Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore ("IRAS") in compliance with Section 63 of the Income Tax Act;(iii)Preparing, reviewing and finalising the income tax return (Form C and Appendices) and income tax computation based on audited accounts (and additional information as may be obtained from the Singapore Branch) and filing these with the IRAS upon approval by the Singapore Branch; (iv)Reviewing the Notices of assessment issued by the IRAS based on ECI and tax computations filed and assisting to lodge objection if applicable; and (iv)Responding to queries raised by the IRAS.
